name: International Meeting on Fluid Dynamics & Fluid Mechanics
content: Conference series LLC Ltd is organizing Fluid Dynamics Conference in 2022\. We organize Fluid Dynamics conferences in the fields related to Fluid Mechanics, Fluid Kinematics, Fluid Statics, Aerodynamics, Hydrodynamics and Aerospace applications etc. The conference also covers a wide range of topics, including basic formulations and their computer modelling as well as the relationship between experimental and analytical results..
